headline: Philadelphia Plans Birth Control Course
snippet: PHILADELPHIA, Dec. 2 (UPI)-- The Philadelphia School District has proposed that junior and senior high school students be offered a course in birth control. If approved by the school board, students would study 11 types of birth control, seven for...

headline: India Disappointed in Birth Control by Persuasion; Grave Population Problem Government Acknowledged Slowdown
snippet: NEW DELHI, Aug. 8--Prime Minister Morarji R. Desai, conceding that there have been substantial setbacks in India's birth-control program, has issued a new appeal against "unlimited population growth."

headline: Nonwhite Growth Rate Poses a Challenge to South Africa; Growth Rate Among the Highest African Versions of Calcutta Medical Services Foster Growth Resistance at Birth-Control Clinic Faith Is Put in the Pass Laws More Housing for Blacks Is Urged
snippet: JOHANNESBURG, July 30--Constance Magadla, a black woman earning the equivalent of $13.80 a week as a night cleaner in an office building, has five children. Her two sisters have seven children between them. Constance, the oldest of the three, is 29....

snippet: EAST MEADOW, L.I.--The mother was insistent: She had reason to believe that her teen-age son and his girlfriend, were sexually active and she wanted them to go to the Adolescent Clinic run by the Nassau County Family Planning Project at Nassau County...

headline: The Birth of Birth Control; Birth
snippet: WHEN our American ancestors tried to prevent the birth of too many of us descendants, they resorted to a variety of methods. Coitus  interruptus was the 19th-century favorite. In addition, there were douches, sponges, potions and powders, the rhythm...

headline: Birth Control Slows in India; Targets Put Back by Years; Other Methods Also Decline Goal Drastically Reduced Effect Is Immediate Sterilization Is Keystone
snippet: NEW DELHI, Feb. 5--Indian health officials, conceding that there has been a considerable slowdown in their birth-control campaign, have pushed back by several years their targets for reducing the country's birth rate.

headline: Abortion Is a Major Form of Birth Control in Japan; A Growing Concern Liberalized Law in 1948
snippet: TOKYO, Feb. 4--Last month Dr. Shiro Sugiyama delivered 40 babies in his modern medical clinic here. During the same period he performed 80 abortions.

headline: MORE CONTROL URGED FOR SOME COSMETICS; G.A.O. Says 17 Products Contain Potential Health Hazards-- Industry Disputes Charge Statement by Trade Group New Birth Control Pill Warning
snippet: WASHINGTON, Feb. 3 (AP)--Congressional investigators said today that Federal regulators must be given more authority to control 17 commonly used products that they said contained possible cancer-causing agents.
